name: Beach break in Phu Quoc Island
description:
Phu Quoc is a nice beach extension in your tour to Vietnam. Just 45-minute flight
from Ho Chi Minh City, beach holiday to Phu Quoc Island will provide you the
best chance to discover the beautiful part of the island that has not been
touched by tourists. Spend four days relaxing on the white sand beach and warm
waters. You can enjoy snorkeling or scuba diving trip on this beautiful island.
If you wish a bit more activities while staying here, you can have excursions
by jeep through the island interior to visit Phu Quoc fish sauce factory,
pepper plantations and dozens of fishing hamlets.
